mapper.select: select * from sys_dictionary_item t where 1=1 and fk_dictionary_uuid='${FK_UUID}' and item_name like '%${ITEM_NAME}%' and item_code like '%${ITEM_CODE}%' order by t.item_code
mapper.delete: delete from sys_dictionary_item where uuid in(#{uuid})
mapper.select: select t.item_code, t.business_type from sys_dictionary_item t where 1=1 and t.item_code like '${code}%' and t.is_enabled='1'
select * from sys_dictionary_item where is_enabled='1' and fk_dictionary_uuid= (select uuid from SYS_DICTIONARY where DICTIONARY_CODE=#{pcode}) order by cust_number01 asc
